page.title: 14Clubs and Activities in EK
page.content: At the police station, close by the Town Centre, is a Karate Club for policemen and their families. It is free of charge and takes place on a Tuesday and Thursday night from 5-7pm The Karate suits cost from Â£16-Â£24 for children and Â£25 upwards for adults. There are gradings with colour belts and these belts cost Â£6. A Roller Disco takes place in the Olympia at the Town Centre twice a week. On a Thursday night it lasts from 7 till 10.30pm and costs 80p. On a Saturday afternoon it starts at 1pm and finishes at 3.30pm and costs 60p. The Key Youth Club offers teenagers all sorts of indoor activities as well as giving many of the local groups the chance to do a gig. It also organises many outdoor and weekend activities such as skiing trips to the Cairngorms
